import { Add, ArrowBackIosNew, Delete, Edit } from "@mui/icons-material"; import { Button, Card, CardContent, CardMedia, Container, Divider, Grid, IconButton, Typography, } from "@mui/material"; import { Box } from "@mui/system"; import MUIRichTextEditor from "mui-rte"; import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { makeStyles } from "@mui/styles"; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { height: 256, }, image: { height: 144, }, row: { display: "flex", flexDirection: "row", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", }, cardMedia: { height: 156, width: "100%", }, column: { display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", justifyContent: "start", alignItems: "start", }, })); const CardItem = (props) => { const classes = useStyles(); const { image, name, position, id } = props; const history = useHistory(); return ( {name}
{position}
); }; const RSPHCMB = () => { const { data } = useSelector((state) => state.rsphcmb); const { teamMembersData } = useSelector((state) => state.teams); const history = useHistory(); return (


WHO WE ARE

CONTENT history.push({ pathname: "/dashboard/about/rsphcmb/who_we_are_content", state: { content: data?.who_we_are, }, }) } >


VISION & MISSION STATEMENT history.push({ pathname: "/dashboard/about/rsphcmb/vision_mission_edit", state: { vision: data?.vision, mission: data?.mission, image: data?.visionImage, }, }) } >
VISION STATEMENT {data?.vision}
MISSION STATEMENT {data?.mission}


GOVERNOR & DEPUTY history.push({ pathname: "/dashboard/about/rsphcmb/governor_edit", state: { governorName: data?.governorName, governorImage: data?.governorImage, deputyGovName: data?.deputyGovName, deputyGovImage: data?.deputyGovImage, }, }) } >
GOVERNOR
{data?.governorName} Governor, Rivers State
DEPUTY GOVERNOR
{data?.governorName} Governor, Rivers State

TEAM MEMBERS
{teamMembersData?.map((_, index) => ( ))}
); }; export default RSPHCMB;
